pkgmetadata.longdescription: BibTeX-compatible bibliography processor in Python==================================================Synopsis--------:: latex foo.tex pybtex foo.aux latex foo.tex latex foo.texDescription-----------Pybtex reads citation information from a file andproduces a formatted bibliography. BibTeX style files are supported.Alternatively it is possible to write styles in Python.Pybtex currently understands the following bibliography formats:- BibTeX- BibTeXML- YAML-based formatThe resulting bibliography may be output in one of the following formats(not supported by legacy BibTeX styles):- LaTeX- HTML- markdown- plain textSee also--------- `Home page <https://pybtex.org/>`_- `Pybtex at Bitbucket <https://bitbucket.org/pybtex-devs/pybtex>`_- `Pybtex at PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/pybtex>`_
